pullRequest.title: Remove Apache Avro Dependency from SchemaRegistry
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR investigates the changes required to remove the Apache Avro dependency from azure-data-schemaregistry-avro. To help alleviate functionality lost in removing this dependency additional APIs are being added into azure-core-experimental for the Avro implementations.

commit.message: Prototype additional Avro APIs of getSchema and getSchemaName

nodes.bodyText: Made AvroSerializer a sub-interface to ObjectSerializer so it can extend at will in the future without cause breaking changes.
Added these new methods to the provider as they are tied to the specific implementation and not a specific serializer instance.

Not sure how this will work.
The output of this function is required for calling decode().  So if we don't do the parse here, then decode() will have to parse.  That'll lose the deserialization caching that happens on the SR client layer.
